body.name: Blockaroo Magnetic Foam Blocks – STEM Preschool Toys for Children, Toddlers, Boys and Girls, The Ultimate Bath Toy – Critter Set, Bath Building Blocks, Engineering Toys for Kids 3-6
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 33 mins
features: EASIEST BUILDING SYSTEM FOR YOUNG LEARNERS - Blockaroo blocks are a new way to build. Our patent-pending foam magnetic blocks click together like magic, rotate 360-degrees, and always attract to each other, creating a multi-sensory experience that kids love.

STEM TOYS THAT ENCOURAGE LEARNING – Preschoolers will develop engineering and creative thinking skills, explore shapes, colors, and building with these soft foam blocks! Provides hours of engaging, creative play that helps developing minds grow!

SAFE, NON-TOXIC & DURABLE - Blockaroo builders are tested to the highest levels and exceed all international safety testing standards. 100% dishwasher safe, mold free, and insanely durable, they’re the perfect STEM activity for any classroom.

FUN, EDUCATIONAL & EASY - Blockaroo blocks float and can be used as a creative bath/water toy that encourages children to let their imaginations set sail. Parents love how Blockaroo blocks make bath time an experience kids look forward to!
DEVELOPED BY TEACHERS - Blockaroo building blocks were developed by teachers and have earned the Mom's Choice Award, Tillywig Brain Child Award, and the Parent and Teacher Choice Award.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why are Blockaroo blocks quickly becoming a favorite among parents? Blockaroo blocks are the easiest-to-use building blocks ever created. They are an award-winning STEM toy developed by teachers.They have earned the Mom’s Choice Gold Award, Tillywig Brain Child Award, and the Parent and Teacher Choice Award.All Blockaroo blocks are safe to play with in the bath!This innovative magnetic system allows the blocks to connect like magic and never repel.Blocks rotate 360-degrees when connected and make a satisfying click sound, creating a multi-sensory experience that your kids will love!These large, soft foam blocks teach important early STEM skills such as counting, sorting, and stacking for toddlers while stimulating tactile and sensory development.Blockaroo non-toxic magnetic blocks are safety tested to exceed the highest international toy standards. These sturdy blocks are designed to grow with your child. Younger children love the bright colors, playful sound and easy-connect building system that encourage tactile learning and shape recognition. Older children are fascinated by the endless building possibilities provided by the 360-degree rotation capability and the mix and match nature of these blocks. The interactive elements of Blockaroo building toys encourage socialization and teamwork so they’re perfect for classrooms and bringing families together for quality time. Blockaroo blocks are also so much fun in the bath! The foam bricks float and even stick to most bathtubs due to the metal liner common inside most tubs. They keep kids learning and having fun in the bath, transforming bath time into an experience parents and kids look forward to! Blockaroo blocks are also easy to clean. Whenever they need to be cleaned or sterilized, just pop them in the top rack of the dishwasher and they’re as good as new! Get Blockaroo blocks today and change the way your kids build, learn, and create!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun, ease of use, keeps entertained, sturdy, best toy
reviews.reviewText: I have to say if you buy one toy for your children /grandchildren buy blockaroos. .I originally bought a 100 piece set for my house for the grandkids and they loved them. I bought them a set for their house. I also added the car set and the submarine set (great for bath time) for future gifts.As a grandparent I do enjoy the fun and creativity of the building blocks. They are easy to put together and fun to make things.I enjoy playing with them with my grandkids but they want all the blocks for their own inventions.It is the one toy that keeps my grandkids entertained for hours. They use them constantly always coming up with new designs.I bought them when my grandkids were 2 1/2 and 1 and at 4 and 2 1/2 they are still using them. Even when the older cousins come they play with them.I know some people think the cost is a little much but I would rather a quality product that is used over and over to a poorly made toy hardly used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We already had some smaller sets of Blockaroo so I knew I liked them! Having more to build things re-inspired my almost 4 year olds! We love how they connect and like the clicking sound as you turn them. My boys use their imaginations to make all sorts of things. Younger children like them as well, I just have to watch the 1 1/2 year old because she will try to chew on them. I can not leave her unsupervised with them even for a minute but she loves them when I let her play with them (and I am sitting with her). Expensive but a great toy to encourage imaginations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These blocks are the best! The only problem? They’re WAY to expensive!! If there was ever a more affordable alternative I would swap brands in a heart beat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really neat gift for kids
reviews.reviewText: Got this gift for kids for Christmas. They loved it and it let's them explore their creativity which you definitely need for this toy. Makes me want to buy more or a bigger set

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this set for my 3 and 5 year old grandsons. They already had a couple of the smaller sets and loved them. It’s an excellent building toy as well as for the bath. The only thing problem I have with this set is there are no ideas for different things they can build. This is a little pricy but definitely worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are awesome toys
reviews.reviewText: I love these creativity/imagination sparking magnetic blocks. So much more fun than blocks which come apart when bumped. 5 stars!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars KIDS LOVE IT!!!
reviews.reviewText: I gave it to my 3-year old grandchild. It was love at first sight. The older sisters want to play with it, the visiting friends want to play with it, everyone wants to play with it! And, after all the use and ABUSE, it looks brand new.They love that it rotates, they love the magnets, they love that it can also go into the bathtub. Big success!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids fight over this toy.
reviews.reviewText: I have bought a couple small sets. The kids fight over it. Bought a big set. Problem solved! A bit pricey but the kids love them and have been playing with these toys for a couple years now. Can play with them anywhere, even the bath. Stick them on your fridge. If you live in an older Sears home, stick them on the wall.
The blockaroo products are creative, soft and fun . Make many interesting items and the time files by . An excellent product
Jeu très ludique et très apprécié pour créer

Die Bausteine sind sehr leicht und doch stabil! Der Fantasie sind keine Grenzen gesetzt, ausser in der Hinsicht, dass man für den Preis eher wenig Bausteine erhält. Würde das Produkt aber dennoch wieder kaufen bzw. erweitern, da es sehr vielseitig ist und sowohl unseren 3jährigen Sohn als auch den 5jährigen Nachbarsjungen beschäftigt! Werden es im Sommer dann auch im Planschbecken testen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Our 2 year old is having a great time with these. Although I think the price is a little steep for the amount of pieces you get, my little boy is having a great time playing with them.It allows children to really use their imaginations to connect them together and build different things each time. However I will say I feel once you build a little top heavy or try to pick your design up, it doesn't take much to break apart. Not much of a big issue though, they're great fun.

I don't understand how this highly overpriced product was on so many best toys lists. 17 tiny pieces for over a 100 SGD! For some reason I thought at least the pieces would be big enough to hold my kid's attention but this was too small. Play literally ended as soon as it began. I don't mind paying but this was the most disappointing purchase ever. Would have returned it if it was not a long process.
